tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Siddhartha's professionalism is unmatched, ensuring that each visit is both efficient and thorough. I truly appreciate his caring nature, as he always takes the time to make sure I am comfortable and understand the procedures. He is incredibly adjustable with his schedule, making it convenient for his patients to get the care they need. With his extensive expertise, Dr. Siddhartha consistently provides top-notch dental care that I can trust. He combines his professional skills with a genuine caring attitude, making every dental visit a positive experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Mucogingival Surgery,Artificial Teeth,Laser Gum Surgery,Tooth Coloured Fillings,Bleeding Gums Treatment,
review: Dr Pujari was absolutely amazing, his professionalism together with his caring patient care leaves him second to none. Upon consultation and comprehensive investigation he offered further explanations on the various treatment options.  During treatment Dr Pujari was extremely gentle ensuring that there was minimum discomfort allowing for anxiety and pain.  After surgery the team  have followed up to check in with me and make sure that I have not had any side effects from the medication.  I would absolutely recommend Smileoracle Dental for their excellent customer service and informed dental treatment advise . Thank you Dr Pujari and your team.

review: I had an excellent experience with my dentistDr Siddhartha Pujari during my teeth straightening braces treatment. From the initial consultation to the final adjustments, my dentist was professional, knowledgeable, and caring. They explained the treatment process thoroughly and answered all of my questions, putting me at ease. The office was clean, well-maintained, and had the latest technology to ensure that my treatment was as efficient and effective as possible. The results of my braces treatment were outstanding, and I couldn't be happier with my new, straighter smile. Overall, I would highly recommend my dentist for anyone considering teeth straightening braces.
